link.sql: select{([ tb.id, tb.rank, tb.lead, tb.path, tb.name, tb.icon, tb.sort, tb.status, tb.modifyUser, tb.modifyTime, tb.createUser, tb.createTime, g.path groupPath, g.name groupName, g.icon groupIcon, g.sort groupSort, p.path platePath, p.name plateName, p.icon plateIcon, p.sort plateSort, mu.login modifyUserLogin, cu.login createUserLogin, ])}from tb_link tb left join tb_link g on g.id=tb.lead left join tb_link p on p.id=g.lead left join tb_user mu on mu.id=tb.modifyUser left join tb_user cu on cu.id=tb.createUser

select p.id plateId,p.name plateName,p.icon plateIcon ,g.id groupId,g.name groupName,g.icon groupIcon from tb_link p join tb_link g on g.lead=p.id where p.lead='@' and p.rank=1 and g.rank=2 order by p.sort,g.sort
